system.description:
A looking glass, 4’ tall and 3’ wide, which brings to life a double of anyone reflected in its surface.

  • Reflections of creatures: Will step out of the mirror, magically brought to life, and attack the original.

  • Mirror opposites: Have the same statistics, abilities (including spells), and equipment as the original.

  • Defeat: If the mirror opposite or the original is killed, the mirror opposite disappears with all its equipment.
